references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced a significant advancement in diffusion models, demonstrating their superiority over GANs in image synthesis, a foundational technique leveraged in the current paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work introduced Stable Diffusion, a highly efficient and influential diffusion model that significantly impacts the field and serves as a basis for several methods in the current paper.
This paper introduced a groundbreaking zero-shot text-to-image generation method, a fundamental technique underlying much of the current work on multi-view image generation.
This work is a major direct predecessor to the current research and a key reference as it directly addresses the task of multi-view image generation.

This paper presents a state-of-the-art method in multi-view image generation using epipolar attention, offering significant improvements in efficiency and consistency, which the current paper builds upon.
